title: David Roulston: Let the police bias verdict stand
description: The Court of Appeals has upheld the bias verdict against the city of Greenfield and its former police chief. Leonard Kesten, who nominally represented the city but who was hired and paid by an insurance company, wants to consult with his “client” before deciding to seek a further appeal.

title: Mattea Kramer: Small actions are powerful
description: So many of us feel an urgent need to do something right now, even as we simultaneously feel powerless. In fact, there are things we can do — many powerful things. Culturally, we tend to value big, grand actions, but small acts add up in ways we cannot know.

title: Leo Ojala: ‘Trump did this’ stickers at the gas station
description: I’ve been away traveling. I’ll be back on the weekend. I’m glad I filled up with cheap Biden-era gas before heading to the airport. The next time I fill up, I’ll be looking for the stickers at the price of fuel that say “Felonious Trump did this.”

title: Duplex Stainless Steel Pipe Market to Grow by USD 166.6 Million from 2025-2029, Driven by Rising Industrialization in APAC, Report on AI Driving Market Transformation - Technavio
creator: PRNewswire
description: NEW YORK, Feb. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Report with the AI impact on market trends - The duplex stainless steel pipe market and it is set to grow by USD 166.6 million from 2025 to 2029. However, the growth momentum will progressing at a CAGR of 4.4% during the forecast period, according to Technavio. The duplex stainless steel pipe market is fragmented, and the vendors are seeking strong partnerships with automotive, industrial, and commercial companies to compete in the market. Acerinox SA, Allegheny Technologies Inc., Aperam SA, ArcelorMittal SA, Carpenter Technology Corp., Centravis Production Ukraine PJSC, Continental Steel and Tube Co., Daido Steel Co. Ltd., JFE Holdings Inc., Jindal Steel and Power Ltd., JSW Group, Metline Industries, Nippon Steel Corp., Outokumpu Oyj, POSCO holdings Inc., Rolled Alloys Inc., Sandvik AB, Tata Steel Ltd., thyssenkrupp AG, and Tubacex SA are some of the major market participants -. To know about the vendor offerings - Request a sample report Duplex Stainless Steel Pipe Market 2025-2029: ScopeTechnavio presents a detailed picture of the market by the way of study, synthesis, and summation of data from multiple sources. The duplex stainless steel pipe market report covers the following areas:Duplex Stainless Steel Pipe Market SizeDuplex Stainless Steel Pipe Market TrendsDuplex Stainless Steel Pipe Market Industry AnalysisPorter's Five Forces AnalysisCustomer LandscapeThe duplex stainless steel pipe market is fragmented, and the degree of fragmentation will accelerate. The rising industrialization in APAC will offer immense growth opportunities. However, the Volatility in raw material prices will hamper the market growthDuplex Stainless Steel Pipe Market 2025-2029: Drivers & ChallengesThe Duplex Stainless Steel Pipe market is witnessing significant growth due to its extensive usage in various industries. Key drivers include mining and nuclear power plants, where its high strength and corrosion resistance are crucial. In the oil and gas sector, duplex pipes are used for process piping systems, separators, scrubbers, pumps, manifolds, flowlines, pipelines, and desalination plants. The chemical industry relies on duplex pipes for reactors, heat exchangers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks. In infrastructure, it's used for water heaters, digesters, bleaching reactors, handrails, architectural cladding, roofing, wall support products, reinforcing bars, corner guards, tension systems, and structural applications. Raw materials prices influence market trends, but the versatility and durability of duplex stainless steel ensure its continued demand ...Full story available on Benzinga.com
